title: Giacomo Bernini
text:
Giacomo Bernini (born 22 October 1989) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays as a variety of positions. He currently plays for <a href="Verona%20Rugby">Verona</a>.
Born and raised in Livorno between Lions and Amaranto Livorno, in 2010 season he moved to <a href="Rugby%20San%20Don%C3%A0">Amatori Rugby San Donà</a>, playing in Serie A1. In 2011, Giacomo joined top-flight side <a href="Rugby%20Club%20I%20Cavalieri%20Prato">Prato</a>. That season he won the team's award of "Best Newcomer". In January 2014, he trained with <a href="Zebre">Zebre</a> as a permit player. In June 2014, it was announced that he joined <a href="Rugby%20San%20Don%C3%A0">Amatori Rugby San Donà</a> .
